email.text:
Photos for IC Hack 19 are now available! Check them out on Facebook [here](https://www.facebook.com/pg/ICDoCSoc/photos/?tab=album&album_id=2589206401095893). Get tagging! Photos can also be found in higher quality on [Flickr](https://www.flickr.com/photos/paulmonishbalaji/sets/72157706623151464/).
Remember to also check out [photobooth photos](https://www.open.photos/ICHACK19/), [montage video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oy6tcQY6K6Q) (thanks to [t4run media](https://www.t4run.com/)) and if you're feeling extra nostalgic, you can also re-watch the [Opening Ceremony](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VsOa8KYeWpo) and [Closing Ceremony](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=piaTBgY5EUc) from our YouTube live streams!
Don't forget - we'll be releasing tickets for [IC HealthHack 2019](https://www.facebook.com/events/293101718230640/) soon! Run joint with Bioengineering Society and ICSM Coding Society, IC HealthHack 2019 will take place on 9-10th March 2019.
_Photos courtesy of our amazing photographer, [Paul Balaji](https://www.instagram.com/thepaulbalaji/)._

We look forward to seeing you next year for **IC Hack 20**!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
